   127	class DeepseekV2MLP(nn.Module):
   128	    def __init__(
   129	        self,
   130	        hidden_size: int,
   131	        intermediate_size: int,
   132	        hidden_act: str,
   133	        quant_config: Optional[QuantizationConfig] = None,
   134	        reduce_results: bool = True,
   135	        prefix: str = "",
   136	        tp_rank: Optional[int] = None,
   137	        tp_size: Optional[int] = None,
   138	    ) -> None:
   139	        super().__init__()
   140	        self.gate_up_proj = MergedColumnParallelLinear(
   141	            hidden_size,
   142	            [intermediate_size] * 2,
   143	            bias=False,
   144	            quant_config=quant_config,
   145	            prefix=add_prefix("gate_up_proj", prefix),
   146	            tp_rank=tp_rank,
   147	            tp_size=tp_size,
   148	        )
   149	        self.down_proj = RowParallelLinear(
   150	            intermediate_size,
   151	            hidden_size,
   152	            bias=False,
   153	            quant_config=quant_config,
   154	            reduce_results=reduce_results,
   155	            prefix=add_prefix("down_proj", prefix),
   156	            tp_rank=tp_rank,
   157	            tp_size=tp_size,
   158	        )
   159	        if hidden_act != "silu":
   160	            raise ValueError(
   161	                f"Unsupported activation: {hidden_act}. "
   162	                "Only silu is supported for now."
   163	            )
   164	        self.act_fn = SiluAndMul()
   165	
   166	    def forward(self, x, forward_mode: Optional[ForwardMode] = None):
   167	        gate_up, _ = self.gate_up_proj(x)
   168	        x = self.act_fn(gate_up)
   169	        x, _ = self.down_proj(x)
   170	        return x

   173	class MoEGate(nn.Module):
   174	    def __init__(
   175	        self,
   176	        config,
   177	        prefix: str = "",
   178	    ):
   179	        super().__init__()
   180	        self.weight = nn.Parameter(
   181	            torch.empty((config.n_routed_experts, config.hidden_size))
   182	        )
   183	        if config.topk_method == "noaux_tc":
   184	            self.e_score_correction_bias = nn.Parameter(
   185	                torch.empty((config.n_routed_experts))
   186	            )
   187	        else:
   188	            self.e_score_correction_bias = None
   189	
   190	    def forward(self, hidden_states):
   191	        logits = F.linear(hidden_states, self.weight, None)
   192	        return logits

   228	
   229	        self.experts = MoEImpl(

   246	            ),

   276	            self.num_experts = config.n_routed_experts
   277	            self.top_k = config.num_experts_per_tok
   278	            self.renormalize = config.norm_topk_prob
   279	            self.topk_group = config.topk_group
   280	            self.num_expert_group = config.n_group
   281	            self.correction_bias = (
   282	                self.gate.e_score_correction_bias.data
   283	                if self.gate.e_score_correction_bias is not None
   284	                else None
   285	            )
   286	
   287	            self.deepep_dispatcher = DeepEPDispatcher(
   288	                group=parallel_state.get_tp_group().device_group,
   289	                router_topk=self.top_k,
   290	                permute_fusion=True,
   291	                num_experts=config.n_routed_experts,
   292	                num_local_experts=config.n_routed_experts // self.tp_size,
   293	                hidden_size=config.hidden_size,
   294	                params_dtype=config.torch_dtype,
   295	                deepep_mode=DeepEPMode[global_server_args_dict["deepep_mode"]],
   296	                async_finish=True,  # TODO
   297	                return_recv_hook=True,
   298	            )
   299	
   300	    def forward(
   301	        self, hidden_states: torch.Tensor, forward_mode: Optional[ForwardMode] = None
   302	    ) -> torch.Tensor:
   303	        if not global_server_args_dict["enable_deepep_moe"]:
   304	            return self.forward_normal(hidden_states)
   305	        else:
   306	            return self.forward_deepep(hidden_states, forward_mode)
   307	
   308	    def forward_normal(self, hidden_states: torch.Tensor) -> torch.Tensor:
   309	        shared_output = self._forward_shared_experts(hidden_states)
   310	        # router_logits: (num_tokens, n_experts)
   311	        router_logits = self.gate(hidden_states)
   312	        final_hidden_states = (
   313	            self.experts(hidden_states=hidden_states, router_logits=router_logits)
   314	            * self.routed_scaling_factor
   315	        )
   316	        if shared_output is not None:
   317	            final_hidden_states = final_hidden_states + shared_output
   318	        if self.tp_size > 1:
   319	            final_hidden_states = tensor_model_parallel_all_reduce(final_hidden_states)
   320	        return final_hidden_states
   321	
   322	    def forward_deepep(
   323	        self, hidden_states: torch.Tensor, forward_mode: ForwardMode
   324	    ) -> torch.Tensor:
   325	        shared_output = None
   326	        topk_idx = torch.full(
   327	            (0, self.top_k), -1, dtype=torch.int, device=hidden_states.device
   328	        )
   329	        topk_weights = torch.empty(
   330	            (0, self.top_k), dtype=torch.float32, device=hidden_states.device
   331	        )
   332	        if (
   333	            forward_mode is not None
   334	            and not forward_mode.is_idle()
   335	            and hidden_states.shape[0] > 0
   336	        ):
   337	            # router_logits: (num_tokens, n_experts)
   338	            router_logits = self.gate(hidden_states)
   339	            shared_output = self._forward_shared_experts(hidden_states)
   340	            topk_weights, topk_idx = select_experts(
   341	                hidden_states=hidden_states,
   342	                router_logits=router_logits,
   343	                top_k=self.top_k,
   344	                use_grouped_topk=True,
   345	                renormalize=self.renormalize,
   346	                topk_group=self.topk_group,
   347	                num_expert_group=self.num_expert_group,
   348	                correction_bias=self.correction_bias,
   349	                routed_scaling_factor=self.routed_scaling_factor,
   350	            )
   351	        if self.ep_size > 1:
   352	            # TODO(ch-wan): allow users to set num_max_dispatch_tokens_per_rank value
   353	            (
   354	                hidden_states,
   355	                topk_idx,
   356	                topk_weights,
   357	                reorder_topk_ids,
   358	                seg_indptr,
   359	                masked_m,
   360	                expected_m,
   361	            ) = self.deepep_dispatcher.dispatch(
   362	                hidden_states,
   363	                topk_idx,
   364	                topk_weights,
   365	                forward_mode=forward_mode,
   366	            )
   367	        final_hidden_states = self.experts(
   368	            hidden_states=hidden_states,
   369	            reorder_topk_ids=reorder_topk_ids,
   370	            seg_indptr=seg_indptr,
   371	            masked_m=masked_m,
   372	            expected_m=expected_m,
   373	            forward_mode=forward_mode,
   374	        )
   375	        if self.ep_size > 1:
   376	            final_hidden_states = self.deepep_dispatcher.combine(
   377	                final_hidden_states,
   378	                topk_idx,
   379	                topk_weights,
   380	                forward_mode,
   381	            )
   382	        final_hidden_states *= self.routed_scaling_factor
   383	
   384	        if shared_output is not None:
   385	            final_hidden_states = final_hidden_states + shared_output
   386	
   387	        return final_hidden_states

   392	        else:

   127	class DeepseekV2MLP(nn.Module):
   128	    def __init__(
   129	        self,
   130	        hidden_size: int,
   131	        intermediate_size: int,
   132	        hidden_act: str,
   133	        quant_config: Optional[QuantizationConfig] = None,
   134	        reduce_results: bool = True,
   135	        prefix: str = "",
   136	        tp_rank: Optional[int] = None,
   137	        tp_size: Optional[int] = None,
   138	    ) -> None:
   139	        super().__init__()
   140	        self.gate_up_proj = MergedColumnParallelLinear(
   141	            hidden_size,
   142	            [intermediate_size] * 2,
   143	            bias=False,
   144	            quant_config=quant_config,
   145	            prefix=add_prefix("gate_up_proj", prefix),
   146	            tp_rank=tp_rank,
   147	            tp_size=tp_size,
   148	        )
   149	        self.down_proj = RowParallelLinear(
   150	            intermediate_size,
   151	            hidden_size,
   152	            bias=False,
   153	            quant_config=quant_config,
   154	            reduce_results=reduce_results,
   155	            prefix=add_prefix("down_proj", prefix),
   156	            tp_rank=tp_rank,
   157	            tp_size=tp_size,
   158	        )
   159	        if hidden_act != "silu":
   160	            raise ValueError(
   161	                f"Unsupported activation: {hidden_act}. "
   162	                "Only silu is supported for now."
   163	            )
   164	        self.act_fn = SiluAndMul()
   165	
   166	    def forward(self, x, forward_mode: Optional[ForwardMode] = None):
   167	        gate_up, _ = self.gate_up_proj(x)
   168	        x = self.act_fn(gate_up)
   169	        x, _ = self.down_proj(x)
   170	        return x

   396	def yarn_get_mscale(scale: float = 1, mscale: float = 1) -> float:
   397	    import math
   398	
   399	    if scale <= 1:
   400	        return 1.0
   401	    return 0.1 * mscale * math.log(scale) + 1.0
